title: Paso Robles Cabernet Blind Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, June 25, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a blind lineup of bold Paso Robles Cabernets. Taste four crowd-favorites without knowing which is which and see how your go-to stacks up against its peers.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines (served blind):

  • Justin Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Dark ruby, ripe red-and-black cherry, cigar box, vanilla-caramel, smooth tannins, and a long, complex finish.
  • DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – Highly perfumed black cherry, cassis, sandalwood, rich black raspberry palate, fine-grained tannins, espresso-vanilla finish.
  • Serial Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Wild berry, sweet herb, cedar nose; Chambord, mocha, licorice flavors with velvety tannins and a savory, lengthy finish.
  • Opolo Summit Creek Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Black plum, olive, dried herbs, blue fruit and cassis core, touches of caramel and leather, plush seamless finish.

Put your palate to the test—taste, guess, reveal, and grab a bottle of your favorite.
